title.narrative: Yemen: Second Basic Education Development Project

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to assist the Government of Yemen in improving student learning and equitable access to basic education in selected governorates and schools.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Effectiveness condition | Description :Basic Education Coordinator, Early Grade Reading Focal Point andEducation Research and Development Center Technical Coordinator have been appointed with tasks, responsibilities and qualificationssatisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Mar-2013
